Talk30:
If you ever need to build something, you
can take anything you want from a
building-material storage area.
You'll find 'em along the road, but just
about every stable has one too!
Talk31:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>I wanna be a swordsman like you, and
now's the perfect time to train!
Talk32: <snd:Sleep_01>Horse god Malanya... <sp:5:1:0>Is that...<sp:5:1:0>true?<sp:0:4:0><snd:Sleep_00>Hehe...<sp:5:1:0> I heard somethin' good...<sp:5:1:0> Zzz...
Talk33:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Everybody knows that kids who sleep
well grow up strong.<sp:0:4:0>If you wanna get buff enough to carry
lumber without a <clr:0000>towing harness<clr:ffff>, you
should get plenty of sleep too!
Talk27_01:
If there's <clr:0000>something you want to move<clr:ffff>,
you should try to earn one quick!
Talk27_02:
If there's <clr:0000>something you want to move<clr:ffff>,
you should put the towing harness on
your horse.
Go to the counter and ask to <clr:0000>change your
horse's gear<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>My dad will get the harness
onto your horse for ya!
Talk01: <sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_00>Yo!<sp:5:0:0> Um, no, I mean...<sp:5:0:0> Hello there! Yeah!
Talk27_03:
You've got your towing harness on your
horse already.<sp:0:4:0>If there's <clr:0000>something you wanna move<clr:ffff>,
just attach it to the harness!
Talk19:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Ah!<sp:5:0:0> Mr. Swordsman!<sp:5:0:0> Welcome to
<clr:0000>Tabantha Bridge Stable<clr:ffff>!
Talk02: <sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_00>Yo!<sp:5:0:0> Er, no, I mean...<sp:5:0:0> Good evening! Yeah!
Talk03:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Welcome to <clr:0000>Tabantha Bridge Stable<clr:ffff>!<sp:5:0:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal_00>You know, you're giving off kind of a
swordsman vibe...

Oh, because you are one. <sp:5:0:0>I see.
Talk20:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Yo!<sp:5:0:0> Mr. Swordsman!<sp:5:0:0> Welcome to
<clr:0000>Tabantha Bridge Stable<clr:ffff>!
Talk04:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>I'm gonna be so buff someday that I won't
even need a <clr:0000>towing harness<clr:ffff> to carry
lumber and stuff!
Talk26_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:Notice_01>Huh? Wait a minute...<sp:5:1:0> You already have a
towing harness!
Talk21:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_00>I'm trying to follow in your footsteps.
If you can train in the rain, so can I!
Talk07:
So, one of the exclusive perks for
<clr:0000>stable members<clr:ffff> is a towing harness
for their horses!
Talk24:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Tired_00>This is my...<sp:5:0:0>training time...<sp:5:0:0> *huff*<sp:5:0:0> So I'm
running around to...<sp:5:0:0>*huff*<sp:5:0:0> build up my
endurance... <sp:5:0:0>Phew...
<sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0200>But if a run's got me this tuckered out, the road to
swordsmanship's gonna be a long one...<clr:ffff><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk07_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>You didn't know about towing harnesses?<sp:5:1:0>
You're gonna love 'em!<sp:5:0:0> I'll tell you all you
need to know.
Talk08:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I guess you're a <clr:0000>stable member <clr:ffff>already,
so you've probably heard this all before.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>But if you keep using stables and building
up your <clr:0000>Pony Points<clr:ffff>, you'll have that
harness before you know it!
Talk25:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_00>This time of day, I'm always here, keeping
watch in case any bad guys come!<sp:0:4:0><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>If bad guys ever do show up, it'll be my job to
keep my family safe...<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk09:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_00>If you sign up to be a <clr:0000>stable member <clr:ffff>at
the counter, I bet you'll be towing stuff
around in no time!
Talk26:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:Notice_01>Wait a sec,<sp:5:0:0> your horse already has a
towing harness on it!
Talk27:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_01>Towing harnesses are great. Once you've
got one, you can have your horse tow a
wagon or even building materials!
Talk28:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL_00>WHOA!<sp:5:0:0> A real live swordsman!<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:5:0:0>


Urk!


<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseM_01><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Sorry!<sp:5:0:0> I said that too loud!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


Oh, I mean, uh... <sp:5:0:0>I'm sorry. I got a little
too excited there.

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_00>Um, <sp:5:0:0>my name is Kenyo!


I want to be a swordsman someday,
so I'm doing all this work to bulk up!
Nice to meet ya!
